Foreign Issuer </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Pursuant to Rule 13a-16 or 15d/16 of </B></FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AEGON posts strong results for second quarter 2010 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Increase in underlying earnings and net income</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Underlying earnings before tax increase to EUR 522&nbsp;million, supported by improved financial markets </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Impairments decline to EUR 77&nbsp;million, their lowest level in two years </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net income improves significantly to EUR 413&nbsp;million </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Return on equity of 9.7% </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Increase in sales and deposits</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New life sales of EUR 590&nbsp;million, driven by increased sales in the United States and United Kingdom </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Gross deposits total EUR 7.6 billion, driven mainly by strong pension deposits in the Americas </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Value of new business declines to EUR 148&nbsp;million, mainly due to decrease of sales in US fixed annuities and UK immediate annuities as a result of earlier
repricing </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>
<TR>

</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Continued strong capital position</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Excess capital above S&amp;P&#146;s AA capital adequacy requirements declines to EUR 3.0 billion, as higher capital requirements from S&amp;P offset earnings
contribution </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
<P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IGD</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">a)</SUP></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"> capital
 surplus of EUR 7 billion, equivalent to solvency ratio of approximately 200% </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Shareholders&#146; equity increases to EUR 8.83&nbsp;per common share </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No interim dividend on common shares </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Statement of Alex Wynaendts, CEO </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The significant increase in sales, underlying earnings and net income during the second quarter of this year demonstrate the continued strength of
AEGON&#146;s business. Consistent with our focus on serving the growing need for long-term retirement security, pension sales were particularly strong in the Americas and the United Kingdom. Impairments in our investment portfolio continued their
downward trend, reaching their lowest level in two years and approaching our long-term assumptions. As a result of changes to S&amp;P&#146;s capital requirements for our businesses, AEGON&#146;s excess capital declined, however, it continues to
provide what we consider a solid buffer. We are implementing a number of key measures, as announced in June, to sharpen our focus on our core activities and improve returns, particularly within our business in the United Kingdom. At the same time,
we are continuing to pursue our options for AEGON&#146;s life reinsurance business, which include finding a suitable buyer for Transamerica Reinsurance. Furthermore, we expect soon to receive a final decision from the European Commission on the plan
we submitted to demonstrate AEGON&#146;s long-term viability as part of the State support AEGON received at the height of the financial crisis in 2008. We will communicate that decision at the earliest opportunity. Going forward, we will maintain
our focus on better leveraging our broad resources, pursuing further operational improvements and putting AEGON&#146;s proven expertise to work for our customers in all our markets.&#148; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Statements are available on <U>www.aegon.com</U> </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">STRATEGIC HIGHLIGHTS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sharpened focus on core activities of life insurance, pensions and asset management</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Restructuring UK business; targeting cost reductions of 25% by end 2011 to improve returns</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Exploring strategic options for life reinsurance business, including identifying a suitable buyer</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Appointment of global head of human resources</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AEGON&#146;s AMBITION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">To be a leader in
<I>all</I> our chosen markets by 2015 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AEGON&#146;S STRATEGIC PRIORITIES </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="97%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reallocate capital</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Increase returns</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Optimize ONE AEGON</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#133;resulting in sustainable, profitable growth.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">At the
Analyst&nbsp;&amp; Investor Conference last June, CEO Alex Wynaendts announced new measures to focus more on key long-term growth opportunities in AEGON&#146;s core activities and further improve returns from the company&#146;s existing businesses.
Over the next five years, AEGON aims to become a leader in all of its chosen markets by being the most recommended life and pensions company by customers, the preferred partner for distributors and an employer of choice among current and prospective
employees. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Reallocate capital </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">One of AEGON&#146;s key strategic objectives is to focus on its core businesses of life insurance, pensions and asset management, and achieve a greater
geographical balance by reallocating capital to the growth markets of Central&nbsp;&amp; Eastern Europe, Asia and Latin America. AEGON continues to assess its businesses to ensure they meet requirements in terms of earnings growth, cash flow
generation, return on capital and customer life cycle needs. As part of this review, AEGON announced in June that it would explore strategic options for Transamerica Reinsurance, the company&#146;s life reinsurance business, including finding a
suitable buyer. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As part of efforts to further improve its risk profile, AEGON will also be increasing equity hedging of its back book of
variable annuities in the United States and continue to shift its focus to fee-based business from spread-based products. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Increase returns
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the United Kingdom, AEGON is taking significant steps to improve the return on capital by targeting cost reductions of 25% in the
company&#146;s life and pension operations and refocusing resources on the At Retirement and Workplace Savings markets where there is strong potential for growth and AEGON has leading positions. In addition, AEGON has withdrawn from the UK bulk
annuities market and is exploring strategic options for parts of its existing back books. Taken together, these measures are aimed at improving return on capital from AEGON&#146;s UK business to 8%-10% and cumulative cash flows of GBP
600&nbsp;million to 650&nbsp;million by 2014. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON aims to increase returns by delivering operational excellence in all of its businesses.
This will be achieved by further reducing costs while investing in core capabilities and improving service levels to ensure continued customer loyalty. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In addition, AEGON is developing new products that are simpler, more transparent and offer customers better value. To deliver on this strategy, AEGON
will further invest in its global workforce. As part of this approach, the company has launched a global talent management program aimed at encouraging and developing talent among employees. Last month, AEGON announced the appointment of a new
global head of human resources, Carla Mahieu, who will work with business units to better leverage the top talent available throughout the organization. In addition, AEGON is rolling out an engagement plan for employees around the world and has
taken steps to bring target compensation for senior management further in line with the company&#146;s overall strategic objectives. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Page&nbsp;2&nbsp;of&nbsp;25</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g11357logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"></P>
 <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Optimize ONE AEGON </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Over the past two years, measures have been taken to manage AEGON more as one international company. AEGON is committed to making better use of its global
resources in managing its businesses, to standardize best practices and to introduce a single balance sheet approach to capital management. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">To meet these objectives, AEGON will implement and monitor new performance measurement standards across the company. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(1,654</B></FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>)&nbsp;</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>(39</I></B></FONT></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g11357logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"></P>
 <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">OPERATIONAL HIGHLIGHTS </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s underlying earnings before tax increased to EUR 522&nbsp;million in the second quarter, a significant improvement compared with the same
period last year. This increase in earnings was due mainly to improved financial markets, strengthening of the US dollar against the euro and growth of the business, while last year&#146;s earnings had also included several exceptional items.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the Americas, underlying earnings totaled EUR 437&nbsp;million, a 51% increase compared with last year, primarily the result of higher
investment income, a recovery in equity markets and lower expenses. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Underlying earnings in the Netherlands came in strong at EUR 97 million.
However, earnings declined as the second quarter last year had included a one-time release in provisions of EUR 20 million. Results for the second quarter of 2010 were also affected by lower investment income and the sale of AEGON&#146;s Dutch
funeral insurance business. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the United Kingdom, underlying earnings increased slightly to EUR 22&nbsp;million as higher profits from
annuities were partly offset by higher project-related expenses. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Underlying earnings from New Markets declined to EUR 40 million. The
inclusion of AEGON Asset Management was more than offset by lower results from Central&nbsp;&amp; Eastern Europe and further investments in the company&#146;s operations in Asia. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Expenses for the holding company increased slightly in the second quarter of 2010 to EUR 74&nbsp;million, primarily a result of higher funding costs.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Fair value items </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the
second quarter, fair value items showed an overall performance of EUR 3 million. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Overperformance in the Netherlands was the result mainly of
gains in the fair value of guarantees and related hedges, partly offset by lower residential real estate values. In the Americas, underperformance was due primarily to a decline in results from credit derivatives and variable annuity guaranteed
minimum withdrawal benefits products, which offset gains from the company&#146;s macro equity hedge. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON has decided to set its short term
equity market return assumption in determining estimated gross profits on variable life and variable annuity products in the Americas at 9% for the second quarter, reflecting the continued volatility experienced in equity markets and the use of
macro equity hedges. This decision resulted in an additional charge of EUR 144&nbsp;million, which has been included in fair value items, partly offsetting gains from the company&#146;s macro equity hedge. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In addition, a widening of AEGON&#146;s own credit spread was more than offset by fair value movements of derivatives, which resulted in a loss for the
holding company. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Gains on investments </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the second quarter, realized gains on investments increased to EUR 148 million. In both the United States and the Netherlands, gains were related
primarily to the sale of bonds as part of asset and liability management, while the gain of EUR 97&nbsp;million in the holding was realized on investments related to excess capital. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Impairment charges </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net impairments
continued their downward trend, amounting to EUR 77&nbsp;million, reaching their lowest level in two years and approaching AEGON&#146;s long-term assumptions. Impairments during the second quarter were primarily related to US housing related
securities. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Other charges </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Other charges amounted to EUR 60 million. These included a one-time provision of EUR 105&nbsp;million for settlement of a dispute related to a Bank-Owned
Life Insurance (BOLI) policy in the United States. Subsequent to the disruption in the credit market, which affected the investment value of the policy&#146;s underlying assets, a suit was filed alleging that the policy terms were not sufficiently
fulfilled by AEGON. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Page&nbsp;5&nbsp;of&nbsp;25</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g11357logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"></P>
 <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This provision was partly offset by a book gain of EUR 33&nbsp;million from the sale of AEGON&#146;s
funeral insurance business in the Netherlands. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Run-off businesses </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s run-off businesses in the Americas recorded a loss in the second quarter of EUR 49 million. This loss was lower than expected because of
better portfolio yields. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Income tax </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Tax charges in the second quarter amounted to EUR 74&nbsp;million and included a EUR 26&nbsp;million tax benefit related to cross-border intercompany
reinsurance transactions between the United States and Ireland. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Operating expenses </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Operating expenses increased 3% to EUR 841&nbsp;million due to a strengthening of the US dollar and pound sterling against the euro. However, operating
expenses declined 2% at constant currencies as result of a number of initiatives to reduce expenses. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>New life sales </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New life sales increased 22% compared with the second quarter of 2009 to EUR 590&nbsp;million as almost all units experienced double-digit growth. The
main drivers behind the increase were pension sales in the United Kingdom and retail life sales in the Americas. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Deposits </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Gross deposits, excluding run-off businesses, rose 16% to EUR 7.6 billion. Primary drivers of the increase were third-party asset management, US pensions
and retail mutual fund inflows, offsetting lower fixed annuity deposits, which were managed lower. Net deposits totaled EUR 1 billion, excluding AEGON&#146;s run-off businesses, as all units reported positive net deposits. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Value of new business </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s
value of new business declined to EUR 148&nbsp;million in the second quarter due to a decrease in the United Kingdom, following earlier repricing of immediate annuities and lower fixed annuity sales in the United States. In Spain, lower sales of
risk products also led to a lower value of new business. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the second quarter, 22% of AEGON&#146;s total value of new business came from New
Markets. The internal rate of return on new business remained strong at 18% in the second quarter. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Revenue-generating investments </B>
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Revenue-generating investments increased 5% compared with the end of the first quarter to EUR 409 billion, primarily as a result of a
strengthening in both the US dollar and the pound sterling against the euro. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Capital management </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-bottom:0px;"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">At the end of the second quarter, AEGON&#146;s core capital position, excluding revaluation reserves, amounted to EUR 18.6 billion,
equivalent to 74% of the company&#146;s total capital base and above its target threshold of 70%. AEGON&#146;s aim is to increase the proportion of core capital over time to
75%</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">6</SUP></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s revaluation reserves at June&nbsp;30, 2010, turned positive for the first time in almost three years and amounted to EUR 588 million. This
significant improvement is mainly the result of an increase in the value of fixed income securities. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Shareholders&#146; equity rose to EUR
17.2 billion as a result of the improved revaluation reserves, strengthening of the US dollar and the pound sterling against the euro, and the addition of second quarter net income. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Excess capital above S&amp;P&#146;s AA capital adequacy requirements declined to EUR 3.0 billion, of which EUR 1.9 billion was held in operating units
and EUR 1.1 billion at the holding company. Positive contributions from earnings and capital preservation measures were more than offset by increased capital requirements for asset related risks. Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s revised their risk
factors, significantly increasing applied charges related primarily to bond portfolios. As a result, capital requirements in the Americas rose during the second quarter by USD 0.9 billion. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">At June&nbsp;30, 2010, AEGON&#146;s Insurance Group Directive (IGD) capital surplus totaled EUR 7 billion, equivalent to a solvency ratio of
approximately 200%. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Page&nbsp;6&nbsp;of&nbsp;25</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g11357logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"></P>
 <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Over the past few months, AEGON has been engaged in the process of obtaining the European
Commission&#146;s final consent to the terms relating to AEGON&#146;s participation in the capital support program of the Dutch State. AEGON expects the European Commission to announce its final decision in the near future. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Dividend </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s dividend policy
remains unchanged and is based on its capital position and cash flows. AEGON aims to maintain a sizeable cash buffer in order to fulfill its priority of repaying the Dutch State as soon as it is responsible and feasible to do so. AEGON will
therefore not declare an interim dividend to common shareholders in 2010. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Risk management </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the second quarter, AEGON reduced its already limited exposure to peripheral European sovereign bonds, which amounted to a market value of EUR 1.5
billion at June&nbsp;30, 2010. As part of this reduction, AEGON sold approximately EUR 450&nbsp;million in Spanish government bonds during the quarter. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Financial strength ratings </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">During the
second quarter, the financial strength ratings of AEGON&#146;s US operating companies were upgraded by A.M. Best to A+ with a Stable outlook, reflecting A.M. Best&#146;s assessment of the companies&#146; financial strength and support of the parent.
In July, Fitch Ratings lowered AEGON&#146;s operating companies&#146; insurer financial strength ratings to AA- and raised the outlook to Stable. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>

<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Distribution</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#151;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AMERICAS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax increase to USD 560&nbsp;million</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Impairments decline to USD 73&nbsp;million</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>New life sales up to USD 212&nbsp;million and strong gross deposits of USD 6.5 billion</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from Life&nbsp;&amp; Protection in the Americas increased to USD 241&nbsp;million, mainly the result of benefits from cost saving initiatives and the absence of
restructuring charges which affected results last year.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Individual Savings&nbsp;&amp; Retirement earnings increased to USD 175 million. Fixed annuity earnings rose as yields on the portfolio increased, while results from variable
annuities also improved due to an increase in overall asset balances.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from Employer Solutions&nbsp;&amp; Pensions increased to USD 95&nbsp;million on improved margins and growth of account balances.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Life reinsurance earnings increased to USD 33&nbsp;million, a result of more favorable mortality experience compared with the second quarter last year.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from AEGON&#146;s operations in Canada amounted to USD 15&nbsp;million, a strong improvement from a loss for the second quarter last year, which included a one-time
charge related to deferred policy acquisition costs of USD 30 million.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Net income </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net income from AEGON&#146;s operations in the Americas declined to USD 255&nbsp;million as improvements in underlying earnings and impairments were more
than offset by the underperformance of fair value items, increased tax charges and a one-off charge related to a settlement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The
underperformance in fair value items totaled USD 39&nbsp;million, mainly due to negative results from credit derivatives and variable annuity guaranteed minimum withdrawal benefits products, which were partly offset by gains from the company&#146;s
macro equity hedge. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON has decided to set its short term equity market return assumption in determining estimated gross profits on
variable life and variable annuity products at 9% for the second quarter, reflecting the continued volatility experienced in equity markets and the use of macro equity hedges. This decision resulted in an additional charge of USD 187&nbsp;million,
which has been included in fair value items, partly offsetting gains from the company&#146;s macro equity hedge. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">During the second quarter,
realized gains on investments amounted to USD 21&nbsp;million and were related to corporate investment grade bonds sold in order to extend the duration of some of AEGON&#146;s investment portfolios. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net impairments decreased to USD 73&nbsp;million in the second quarter, reaching their lowest level in two years and approaching AEGON&#146;s long-term
assumptions. Impairments during the quarter were related primarily to US housing related securities. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Other charges included a one-time
provision of USD 140&nbsp;million for settlement of a dispute related to a Bank-Owned Life Insurance (BOLI) policy in the United States. Subsequent to the disruption in the credit market, which affected the investment value of the policy&#146;s
underlying assets, a suit was filed alleging that the policy terms were not sufficiently fulfilled by AEGON. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s run-off businesses
in the Americas recorded a loss in the second quarter of USD 62 million. This better than expected result was due to higher portfolio yields. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net income from AEGON&#146;s operations in the Americas included a tax expense in the second quarter of USD 12&nbsp;million primarily due to a decline in
tax benefits related to cross-border intercompany reinsurance treaties. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Page&nbsp;10&nbsp;of&nbsp;25</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g11357logo.jpg" ALT="LOGO"></P>
 <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Operating expenses </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Operating expenses declined 17% to USD 484&nbsp;million as a result of lower restructuring charges and employee benefit plan costs and the transfer of
activities to AEGON Asset Management. Excluding restructuring charges and employee benefit plan costs, operating expenses declined slightly as continued cost saving initiatives were absorbed by the first-time inclusion of our partnership in Brazil.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Sales and deposits </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New life
sales increased 13% compared with the second quarter 2009 to USD 212 million. This was mainly a result of growth in AEGON&#146;s retail life insurance businesses across the Americas. New premium production for accident and health products declined
to USD 180&nbsp;million, mainly due to the closure last year of AEGON&#146;s automotive credit business in the United States. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Gross deposits,
excluding run-off businesses, increased 1% to USD 6.5 billion as higher pension and retail mutual fund deposits were offset by fixed annuity deposits, which were managed lower. Net deposits, excluding run-off businesses, totaled approximately USD 1
billion as pension, variable annuity and retail mutual fund inflows offset outflows from fixed annuities in the United States and from segregated funds in Canada. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Value of new business </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Value of new
business declined to USD 80&nbsp;million due primarily to lower fixed annuity sales. The lower contribution from fixed annuities more than offset higher margins of variable annuities and pensions in the United States and an improvement in Canada.
The internal rate of return for the quarter rose to 13%. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Revenue-generating investments </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Compared with the first quarter, revenue-generating investments decreased to USD 302 billion, as new money inflows and the effect of higher bond markets
were more than offset by the impact of a decline in equity markets and outflows from AEGON&#146;s run-off businesses. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>42</I></FONT></TD>

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax amount to EUR 97&nbsp;million</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Net income rises to EUR 170&nbsp;million, including book gain on sale of funeral insurance business</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>New life sales increase to EUR 41&nbsp;million mainly as a result of increased pension sales</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from Life&nbsp;&amp; Savings decreased to EUR 42&nbsp;million as the comparable quarter last year had included a one-time release of provisions of EUR 20 million. The
loss of earnings due to the sale of AEGON&#146;s Dutch funeral insurance business was more than compensated by improved margins on savings account balances.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Pension earnings decreased to EUR 29&nbsp;million mainly due to lower interest results and higher claims.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Non-life earnings improved to EUR 19&nbsp;million mainly as a result of favorable claim experience for both motor and fire insurance.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from Distribution increased to EUR 6&nbsp;million, primarily the result of the sale last year of the company&#146;s loss-making real estate brokerage
activities.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Net income </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net income from AEGON&#146;s operations in the Netherlands increased to EUR 170 million. Fair value items improved to EUR 68&nbsp;million, the result of
positive fair value movements of guarantees and related hedges offset partly by a decline in residential real estate values. Gains on investments amounted to EUR 23&nbsp;million and were mainly the result of gains on the sale of sovereign bonds.
Impairment charges improved to just EUR 6&nbsp;million, while Other income reflected a book gain of EUR 33&nbsp;million on the sale of the funeral insurance business earlier this year. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Operating expenses </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Operating expenses
declined 5% to EUR 182&nbsp;million in the second quarter. This was the result of cost saving initiatives implemented last year, as well as the transfer of asset management activities in the Netherlands to AEGON Asset Management. On a comparable
basis operating expenses remained stable. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Sales and deposits </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New life sales increased 28% compared with the second quarter last year to EUR 41 million. Individual life sales were higher, due to an increase in demand
for mortgage-related products and a rise in sales of immediate annuities. Overall pension sales also increased mainly as a result of a number of larger group pension contracts secured during the quarter. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Value of new business </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Lower spreads in
both AEGON&#146;s mortgage and annuity businesses resulted in a decrease in the value of new business in the second quarter of 2010 to EUR 30 million. The internal rate of return amounted to 17% during the quarter, exceeding the company&#146;s
minimum hurdle rate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Revenue-generating investments </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Revenue-generating investments decreased to EUR 69 billion, down 3% compared with the end of the previous quarter. This decrease was primarily the result
of a transfer of assets related to the sale of the funeral insurance business and lower equity markets during the quarter. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">)&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" COLSPAN="1" VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>&#151;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN="1" NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT></TD>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">UNITED KINGDOM </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax increase to GBP 18&nbsp;million</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Net income rises to GBP 24&nbsp;million</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>New life sales up to GBP 263&nbsp;million &#150; the result of strong pension sales</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B></B></FONT></FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Restructuring UK business; targeting cost reductions of 25% by end 2011 to improve returns</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Underlying earnings before tax </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="98%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Earnings from Life&nbsp;&amp; Protection increased to GBP 15&nbsp;million due to an increase in the size of the annuity book and the expenses related to the closure of the
employee benefit business in the comparable quarter last year.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Pension earnings decreased to GBP 5&nbsp;million as the positive effects of further business growth and improved equity and credit markets were more than offset by higher
expenses associated with investments in developing new propositions.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#161;
</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></SUP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">AEGON&#146;s distribution businesses in the United Kingdom benefitted from improved business performance and market conditions, which limited losses during the quarter to GBP 2
million.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Net income </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Net income for the second quarter of 2010 increased to GBP 24&nbsp;million, mainly because of a sharp decline in impairments. Impairments declined
significantly and totaled just GBP 1&nbsp;million for the quarter. AEGON recorded a loss during the quarter on fair value items in the United Kingdom as a result of a decline in equity markets and an accounting loss on a derivative instrument for
which hedge accounting could not be applied. Gains on investments decreased and comprised essentially gains from the sale of bonds during the quarter, while a larger tax benefit was recorded than in the comparable quarter last year. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Operating expenses </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Operating expenses
decreased 6% to GBP 95&nbsp;million as a result of cost containment and the transfer of asset management activities at the beginning of the year to AEGON Asset Management, partly offset by investments in developing the UK personal pensions market
proposition and increased project-related costs. In June, AEGON announced to re-focus its UK life and pensions business on two core markets &#150; At Retirement and Workplace Savings &#150; and to reduce operating costs 25% by 2011. Plans to deliver
this expense reduction program are currently under development and further detail will be announced later this year. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Sales and deposits
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New life sales increased 25% to GBP 263&nbsp;million as higher sales of pension and retirement products more than offset a decrease in
sales of immediate annuities following earlier repricing and the closure of AEGON&#146;s employee benefit business in the United Kingdom in the second quarter last year. Also, the comparable quarter last year included existing AEGON group personal
pension business that was transferred internally to new group pension contracts. AEGON has decided not to include these rewrites as part of new business reporting as this gives a clearer indication of new premium secured. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Value of new business </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Value of new
business in the United Kingdom declined to GBP 20&nbsp;million due to a decrease in immediate annuity sales as a result of earlier repricing. The internal rate of return on new business during the quarter was 12%. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Revenue-generating investments </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Revenue-generating investments decreased to GBP 52 billion compared with the end of the previous quarter as the positive effects of inflows were more than
offset by a decline in equity markets during the quarter. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="85%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="13%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" NOWRAP><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Page&nbsp;15&nbsp;of&nbsp;25</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="line-height:1px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:1pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="82%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="16%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"></TD>
